Tap each time below to get a feel for a day in the lives of wearables customers.

Music

Listens to music directly from Gear S while getting ready for the day.

Voice Call

Makes a call from Gear S, even with his Galaxy smartphone powered off.

Directions

Uses turn-by-turn navigation on Moto 360 to meet friends for lunch at a new restaurant, while keeping his smartphone in his pocket.

Messaging

Receives and responds to a text with the QWERTY keyboard from his Gear S, while his Galaxy smartphone is back at the office.

Fitness

Tracks steps toward her daily fitness goal on LG G Watch during a workout.
